card.name: Angelic Favor
card.property: If you control a Plains, you may tap an untapped creature you control rather than pay this spell's mana cost. Cast this spell only during combat. Create a 4/4 white Angel creature token with flying. Exile it at the beginning of the next end step.

card.name: Avenger en-Dal
card.property: {2} {W}, {T}, Discard a card: Exile target attacking creature. Its controller gains life equal to its toughness.

card.name: Blinding Angel
card.property: Flying (This creature can't be blocked except by creatures with flying or reach.) Whenever Blinding Angel deals combat damage to a player, that player skips their next combat phase.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "Their eyes will shrivel and blacken before faith's true light."

card.name: Chieftain en-Dal
card.property: Whenever Chieftain en-Dal attacks, attacking creatures gain first strike until end of turn.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: The clearest commands are practical examples.

card.name: Defender en-Vec
card.property: Fading 4 (This creature enters the battlefield with four fade counters on it. At the beginning of your upkeep, remove a fade counter from it. If you can't, sacrifice it.) Remove a fade counter from Defender en-Vec: Prevent the next 2 damage that would be dealt to any target this turn.

card.name: Defiant Falcon
card.property: Flying {4}, {T}: Search your library for a Rebel permanent card with converted mana cost 3 or less and put it onto the battlefield. Then shuffle your library.

card.name: Defiant Vanguard
card.property: When Defiant Vanguard blocks, at end of combat, destroy it and all creatures it blocked this turn. {5}, {T}: Search your library for a Rebel permanent card with converted mana cost 4 or less and put it onto the battlefield. Then shuffle your library.

card.name: Fanatical Devotion
card.property: Sacrifice a creature: Regenerate target creature.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: The Oracle told Eladamri he would save his people by abandoning them. His followers adopted that ideal.

card.name: Lashknife
card.property: If you control a Plains, you may tap an untapped creature you control rather than pay this spell's mana cost. Enchant creature Enchanted creature has first strike.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Those it won't scare, it scars.

card.name: Lawbringer
card.property: {T}, Sacrifice Lawbringer: Exile target red creature.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: One injustice starts a thousand riots. One law stops a thousand crimes. —Lawbringer creed

card.name: Lightbringer
card.property: {T}, Sacrifice Lightbringer: Exile target black creature.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: One thought opens a thousand eyes. One sun brings a thousand dawns. —Lightbringer creed

card.name: Lin Sivvi, Defiant Hero
card.property: {X}, {T}: Search your library for a Rebel permanent card with converted mana cost X or less and put it onto the battlefield. Then shuffle your library. {3}: Put target Rebel card from your graveyard on the bottom of your library.

card.name: Netter en-Dal
card.property: {W}, {T}, Discard a card: Target creature can't attack this turn.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: The wizard's vocabulary of mogg profanities increased with every net she cast.

card.name: Noble Stand
card.property: Whenever a creature you control blocks, you gain 2 life.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Soldiers will always endanger their lives to defend many other lives.

card.name: Off Balance
card.property: Target creature can't attack or block this turn.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: A heavy weapon deals plenty of damage—but it does have to hit.

card.name: Oracle's Attendants
card.property: {T}: All damage that would be dealt to target creature this turn by a source of your choice is dealt to Oracle's Attendants instead.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: The future isn't sacred, but its speaker is.

card.name: Parallax Wave
card.property: Fading 5 (This enchantment enters the battlefield with five fade counters on it. At the beginning of your upkeep, remove a fade counter from it. If you can't, sacrifice it.) Remove a fade counter from Parallax Wave: Exile target creature. When Parallax Wave leaves the battlefield, each player returns to the battlefield all cards they own exiled with Parallax Wave.

card.name: Seal of Cleansing
card.property: Sacrifice Seal of Cleansing: Destroy target artifact or enchantment.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "I am the purifier, the light that clears all shadows." —Seal inscription

card.name: Silkenfist Fighter
card.property: Whenever Silkenfist Fighter becomes blocked, untap it.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Simple wooden staff Made from life, protecting life, Stronger than cold steel.

card.name: Silkenfist Order
card.property: Whenever Silkenfist Order becomes blocked, untap it.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Hands weave life and death; Intertwining spirits knit Tapestries and shrouds.

card.name: Sivvi's Ruse
card.property: If an opponent controls a Mountain and you control a Plains, you may cast this spell without paying its mana cost. Prevent all damage that would be dealt this turn to creatures you control.

card.name: Sivvi's Valor
card.property: If you control a Plains, you may tap an untapped creature you control rather than pay this spell's mana cost. All damage that would be dealt to target creature this turn is dealt to you instead.

card.name: Spiritual Asylum
card.property: Creatures and lands you control have shroud. (They can't be the targets of spells or abilities.) When a creature you control attacks, sacrifice Spiritual Asylum.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Trapped in safety is still trapped.

card.name: Topple
card.property: Exile target creature with the greatest power among creatures on the battlefield. (If two or more creatures are tied for greatest power, target any one of them.)

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "Let all witness the fate of those who defy me." —Crovax

card.name: Voice of Truth
card.property: Flying, protection from white

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "Above them all is Truth, and Truth must be set free. If the wings of Truth are clipped, the voices will fall silent." —*Song of All*, canto 167

card.name: Accumulated Knowledge
card.property: Draw a card, then draw cards equal to the number of cards named Accumulated Knowledge in all graveyards.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "I have seen and heard much here. There are secrets within secrets. Let me show you." —Takara, to Eladamri

card.name: Aether Barrier
card.property: Whenever a player casts a creature spell, that player sacrifices a permanent unless they pay {1}.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "Creatures fade in and out of existence. It's an unfortunate side effect. The losses are tolerable." —Belbe

card.name: Air Bladder
card.property: Enchant creature Enchanted creature has flying. Enchanted creature can block only creatures with flying.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Random mutations among Rootwater merfolk were common—and disturbing.

card.name: Cloudskate
card.property: Flying Fading 3 (This creature enters the battlefield with three fade counters on it. At the beginning of your upkeep, remove a fade counter from it. If you can't, sacrifice it.)

card.name: Daze
card.property: You may return an Island you control to its owner's hand rather than pay this spell's mana cost. Counter target spell unless its controller pays {1}.

card.name: Dominate
card.property: Gain control of target creature with converted mana cost X or less.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "I've come to reclaim what is mine. And you, Greven, are mine." —Volrath

card.name: Ensnare
card.property: You may return two Islands you control to their owner's hand rather than pay this spell's mana cost. Tap all creatures.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Rootwater has become as dangerous to its denizens as to its enemies.

card.name: Infiltrate
card.property: Target creature can't be blocked this turn.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Getting in was the easy part. Getting out proved to be more difficult.

card.name: Jolting Merfolk
card.property: Fading 4 (This creature enters the battlefield with four fade counters on it. At the beginning of your upkeep, remove a fade counter from it. If you can't, sacrifice it.) Remove a fade counter from Jolting Merfolk: Tap target creature.

card.name: Oraxid
card.property: Protection from red

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "I'm constantly amazed by the tenacity of living creatures on this plane. Even in the stronghold's white-hot core, life persists." —Ertai

card.name: Pale Moon
card.property: Until end of turn, if a player taps a nonbasic land for mana, it produces colorless mana instead of any other type.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Denizens of Rath had never seen the moon before. It was a symbol of change, not constancy.

card.name: Parallax Tide
card.property: Fading 5 (This enchantment enters the battlefield with five fade counters on it. At the beginning of your upkeep, remove a fade counter from it. If you can't, sacrifice it.) Remove a fade counter from Parallax Tide: Exile target land. When Parallax Tide leaves the battlefield, each player returns to the battlefield all cards they own exiled with Parallax Tide.

card.name: Rising Waters
card.property: Lands don't untap during their controllers' untap steps. At the beginning of each player's upkeep, that player untaps a land they control.

card.name: Rootwater Commando
card.property: Islandwalk (This creature can't be blocked as long as defending player controls an Island.)

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Rootwater merfolk are seldom seen these days, but elf corpses are as numerous as ever.

card.name: Rootwater Thief
card.property: {U}: Rootwater Thief gains flying until end of turn. Whenever Rootwater Thief deals combat damage to a player, you may pay {2}. If you do, search that player's library for a card and exile it, then the player shuffles their library.

card.name: Seahunter
card.property: {3}, {T}: Search your library for a Merfolk permanent card and put it onto the battlefield. Then shuffle your library.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "They can't feel pain. They just wiggle 'cause they're scared."

card.name: Seal of Removal
card.property: Sacrifice Seal of Removal: Return target creature to its owner's hand.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "I am the unraveler, the loosened thread that will not hold." —Seal inscription

card.name: Sliptide Serpent
card.property: {3} {U}: Return Sliptide Serpent to its owner's hand.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: It's futile to fight something you can see only in the corner of your eye.

card.name: Sneaky Homunculus
card.property: Sneaky Homunculus can't block or be blocked by creatures with power 2 or greater.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Keep watch only for the giants and you'll be eaten by the ants.

card.name: Stronghold Biologist
card.property: {U} {U}, {T}, Discard a card: Counter target creature spell.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: He twists the laws of nature until they scream.

card.name: Stronghold Machinist
card.property: {U} {U}, {T}, Discard a card: Counter target noncreature spell.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: She stretches the laws of physics until they snap.

card.name: Stronghold Zeppelin
card.property: Flying Stronghold Zeppelin can block only creatures with flying.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: As long as the stronghold controlled the sky, the rebels were doomed.

card.name: Submerge
card.property: If an opponent controls a Forest and you control an Island, you may cast this spell without paying its mana cost. Put target creature on top of its owner's library.

card.name: Trickster Mage
card.property: {U}, {T}, Discard a card: You may tap or untap target artifact, creature, or land.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "If it ain't broke, I'll break it. If it is broke, I'll fix it."

card.name: Wandering Eye
card.property: Flying Players play with their hands revealed.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: The evincar has many ways of keeping track of his subjects.

card.name: Ascendant Evincar
card.property: Flying (This creature can't be blocked except by creatures with flying or reach.) Other black creatures get +1/+1. Nonblack creatures get -1/-1.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "Things are going to change around here." —Crovax

card.name: Battlefield Percher
card.property: Flying Battlefield Percher can block only creatures with flying. {1}{B}: Battlefield Percher gets +1/+1 until end of turn.

card.name: Belbe's Percher
card.property: Flying Belbe's Percher can block only creatures with flying.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Long and powerful, these birds were used to carry messages to and from the evincar.

card.name: Carrion Wall
card.property: Defender (This creature can't attack.) {1}{B}: Regenerate Carrion Wall.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: A wall built from the bodies of the enemy will never lack building material in times of war.

card.name: Dark Triumph
card.property: If you control a Swamp, you may sacrifice a creature rather than pay this spell's mana cost. Creatures you control get +2/+0 until end of turn.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: All that's left is the coronation.

card.name: Death Pit Offering
card.property: When Death Pit Offering enters the battlefield, sacrifice all creatures you control. Creatures you control get +2/+2.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "Kill them all and feed them to the new recruits." —Crovax

card.name: Divining Witch
card.property: {1} {B}, {T}, Discard a card: Choose a card name. Exile the top six cards of your library, then reveal cards from the top of your library until you reveal a card with the chosen name. Put that card into your hand and exile all other cards revealed this way.

card.name: Massacre
card.property: If an opponent controls a Plains and you control a Swamp, you may cast this spell without paying its mana cost. All creatures get -2/-2 until end of turn.

card.name: Mind Slash
card.property: {B}, Sacrifice a creature: Target opponent reveals their hand. You choose a card from it. That player discards that card. Activate this ability only any time you could cast a sorcery.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "I can't think with all that screaming."

card.name: Mind Swords
card.property: If you control a Swamp, you may sacrifice a creature rather than pay this spell's mana cost. Each player exiles two cards from their hand.

card.name: Murderous Betrayal
card.property: {B} {B}, Pay half your life, rounded up: Destroy target nonblack creature. It can't be regenerated.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: In darkness, the assassin sneaked into the village and destroyed what Eladamri loved most: his daughter.

card.name: Parallax Dementia
card.property: Enchant creature Fading 1 (This enchantment enters the battlefield with one fade counter on it. At the beginning of your upkeep, remove a fade counter from it. If you can't, sacrifice it.) Enchanted creature gets +3/+2. When Parallax Dementia leaves the battlefield, destroy enchanted creature. That creature can't be regenerated.

card.name: Parallax Nexus
card.property: Fading 5 (This enchantment enters the battlefield with five fade counters on it. At the beginning of your upkeep, remove a fade counter from it. If you can't, sacrifice it.) Remove a fade counter from Parallax Nexus: Target opponent exiles a card from their hand. Activate this ability only any time you could cast a sorcery. When Parallax Nexus leaves the battlefield, each player returns to their hand all cards they own exiled with Parallax Nexus.

card.name: Phyrexian Driver
card.property: When Phyrexian Driver enters the battlefield, other Mercenary creatures get +1/+1 until end of turn.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Although the abuse was initially effective, the troops soon became numb to it.

card.name: Phyrexian Prowler
card.property: Fading 3 (This creature enters the battlefield with three fade counters on it. At the beginning of your upkeep, remove a fade counter from it. If you can't, sacrifice it.) Remove a fade counter from Phyrexian Prowler: Phyrexian Prowler gets +1/+1 until end of turn.

card.name: Plague Witch
card.property: {B}, {T}, Discard a card: Target creature gets -1/-1 until end of turn.

card.name: Rathi Assassin
Rathi Fiend
card.property: When Rathi Fiend enters the battlefield, each player loses 3 life. {3}, {T}: Search your library for a Mercenary permanent card with converted mana cost 3 or less and put it onto the battlefield. Then shuffle your library.

card.name: Rathi Intimidator
card.property: Fear (This creature can't be blocked except by artifact creatures and/or black creatures.) {2}, {T}: Search your library for a Mercenary permanent card with converted mana cost 2 or less and put it onto the battlefield. Then shuffle your library.

card.name: Seal of Doom
card.property: Sacrifice Seal of Doom: Destroy target nonblack creature. It can't be regenerated.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "I am the banisher, the ill will that snuffs the final candle." —Seal inscription

card.name: Spineless Thug
card.property: Spineless Thug can't block.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: These troops are only as strong as the evincar's control.

card.name: Spiteful Bully
card.property: At the beginning of your upkeep, Spiteful Bully deals 3 damage to target creature you control.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Like most creatures bent on total destruction, they rarely bother to double-check their targets.

card.name: Stronghold Discipline
card.property: Each player loses 1 life for each creature they control.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "Crovax never passes up an opportunity to cause widespread misery." —Belbe

card.name: Vicious Hunger
card.property: Vicious Hunger deals 2 damage to target creature and you gain 2 life.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "Blood is foul, the flesh dross. My ascendance thirsts for life itself." —Crovax

card.name: Volrath the Fallen
card.property: {1} {B}, Discard a creature card: Volrath the Fallen gets +X/+X until end of turn, where X is the discarded card's converted mana cost.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "I stepped out. I did not step down."

card.name: Ancient Hydra
card.property: Fading 5 (This creature enters the battlefield with five fade counters on it. At the beginning of your upkeep, remove a fade counter from it. If you can't, sacrifice it.) {1}, Remove a fade counter from Ancient Hydra: It deals 1 damage to any target.

card.name: Arc Mage
card.property: {2} {R}, {T}, Discard a card: Arc Mage deals 2 damage divided as you choose among one or two targets.

card.name: Bola Warrior
card.property: {R}, {T}, Discard a card: Target creature can't block this turn.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: The ingredients for panic include equal parts danger, uncertainty, and helplessness.

card.name: Downhill Charge
card.property: You may sacrifice a Mountain rather than pay this spell's mana cost. Target creature gets +X/+0 until end of turn, where X is the number of Mountains you control.

card.name: Flame Rift
card.property: Flame Rift deals 4 damage to each player.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Crovax hungered for power, and the stronghold devoured the sky.

card.name: Flowstone Crusher
card.property: {R}: Flowstone Crusher gets +1/-1 until end of turn.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "Someone must have done something very bad to make a rock that angry." —Rebel scout

card.name: Flowstone Overseer
card.property: {R} {R}: Target creature gets +1/-1 until end of turn.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: The rebels couldn't see where the roar was coming from. Then they saw it was coming from everywhere.

card.name: Flowstone Slide
card.property: All creatures get +X/-X until end of turn.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: It may look like soil, but its nature is malice.

card.name: Flowstone Strike
card.property: Target creature gets +1/-1 and gains haste until end of turn.

card.name: Flowstone Surge
card.property: Creatures you control get +1/-1.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: The army was never at a loss for weapons; Crovax was their forge.

card.name: Flowstone Wall
card.property: Defender (This creature can't attack.) {R}: Flowstone Wall gets +1/-1 until end of turn.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: The rebels assaulted the wall, never suspecting the wall would assault back.

card.name: Laccolith Grunt
card.property: Whenever Laccolith Grunt becomes blocked, you may have it deal damage equal to its power to target creature. If you do, Laccolith Grunt assigns no combat damage this turn.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: They leave a trail of ash and sorrow.

card.name: Laccolith Rig
card.property: Enchant creature Whenever enchanted creature becomes blocked, you may have it deal damage equal to its power to target creature. If you do, the first creature assigns no combat damage this turn.

card.name: Laccolith Titan
card.property: Whenever Laccolith Titan becomes blocked, you may have it deal damage equal to its power to target creature. If you do, Laccolith Titan assigns no combat damage this turn.

card.name: Laccolith Warrior
card.property: Whenever Laccolith Warrior becomes blocked, you may have it deal damage equal to its power to target creature. If you do, Laccolith Warrior assigns no combat damage this turn.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: The screams are brief. The silence lingers.

card.name: Laccolith Whelp
card.property: Whenever Laccolith Whelp becomes blocked, you may have it deal damage equal to its power to target creature. If you do, Laccolith Whelp assigns no combat damage this turn.

card.name: Mana Cache
card.property: At the beginning of each player's end step, put a charge counter on Mana Cache for each untapped land that player controls. Remove a charge counter from Mana Cache: Add {C}. Any player may activate this ability but only during their turn before the end step.

card.name: Mogg Alarm
card.property: You may sacrifice two Mountains rather than pay this spell's mana cost. Create two 1/1 red Goblin creature tokens.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: They make mountains into mogg holes.

card.name: Mogg Salvage
card.property: If an opponent controls an Island and you control a Mountain, you may cast this spell without paying its mana cost. Destroy target artifact.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Three moggs, one treasure, too bad.

card.name: Mogg Toady
card.property: Mogg Toady can't attack unless you control more creatures than defending player. Mogg Toady can't block unless you control more creatures than attacking player.

card.name: Moggcatcher
card.property: {3}, {T}: Search your library for a Goblin permanent card and put it onto the battlefield. Then shuffle your library.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "They're not worth much, but they're easy to catch."

card.name: Rupture
card.property: Sacrifice a creature. Rupture deals damage equal to that creature's power to each creature without flying and each player.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: All creatures have an inner fire. Releasing it can be dangerous.

card.name: Seal of Fire
card.property: Sacrifice Seal of Fire: It deals 2 damage to any target.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "I am the romancer, the passion that consumes the flesh." —Seal inscription

card.name: Shrieking Mogg
card.property: Haste When Shrieking Mogg enters the battlefield, tap all other creatures.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: You have to admire its enthusiasm.

card.name: Stronghold Gambit
card.property: Each player chooses a card in their hand. Then each player reveals their chosen card. The owner of each creature card revealed this way with the lowest converted mana cost puts it onto the battlefield.

card.name: Animate Land
card.property: Until end of turn, target land becomes a 3/3 creature that's still a land.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Irony is getting walked on by the earth instead of the other way around.

card.name: Blastoderm
card.property: Shroud (This creature can't be the target of spells or abilities.) Fading 3 (This creature enters the battlefield with three fade counters on it. At the beginning of your upkeep, remove a fade counter from it. If you can't, sacrifice it.)

card.name: Coiling Woodworm
card.property: Coiling Woodworm's power is equal to the number of Forests on the battlefield.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Only the elves know where the woods end and the woodworm begins.

card.name: Fog Patch
card.property: Cast this spell only during the declare blockers step. Attacking creatures become blocked. (This spell works on creatures that can't be blocked.)

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Realizing they weren't getting past the fog, the elves did the only thing they could do: wait.

card.name: Harvest Mage
card.property: {G}, {T}, Discard a card: Until end of turn, if you tap a land for mana, it produces one mana of a color of your choice instead of any other type and amount.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "Why should one limit oneself to the resources at hand?"

card.name: Mossdog
card.property: Whenever Mossdog becomes the target of a spell or ability an opponent controls, put a +1/+1 counter on Mossdog.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: The more you look at it, the more dangerous it becomes.

card.name: Nesting Wurm
card.property: Trample When Nesting Wurm enters the battlefield, you may search your library for up to three cards named Nesting Wurm, reveal them, and put them into your hand. If you do, shuffle your library.

card.name: Overlaid Terrain
card.property: As Overlaid Terrain enters the battlefield, sacrifice all lands you control. Lands you control have "{T}: Add two mana of any one color."

property.name: Flavor
property.value: One must reap before one can sow.

card.name: Pack Hunt
card.property: Search your library for up to three cards with the same name as target creature, reveal them, and put them into your hand. Then shuffle your library.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: The one you see is just a diversion.

card.name: Refreshing Rain
card.property: If an opponent controls a Swamp and you control a Forest, you may cast this spell without paying its mana cost. Target player gains 6 life.

card.name: Reverent Silence
card.property: If you control a Forest, rather than pay this spell's mana cost, you may have each other player gain 6 life. Destroy all enchantments.

card.name: Rhox
card.property: You may have Rhox assign its combat damage as though it weren't blocked. {2}{G}: Regenerate Rhox. (The next time this creature would be destroyed this turn, it isn't. Instead tap it, remove all damage from it, and remove it from combat.)

card.name: Saproling Burst
card.property: Fading 7 (This enchantment enters the battlefield with seven fade counters on it. At the beginning of your upkeep, remove a fade counter from it. If you can't, sacrifice it.) Remove a fade counter from Saproling Burst: Create a green Saproling creature token. It has "This creature's power and toughness are each equal to the number of fade counters on Saproling Burst." When Saproling Burst leaves the battlefield, destroy all tokens created with Saproling Burst. They can't be regenerated.

card.name: Saproling Cluster
card.property: {1}, Discard a card: Create a 1/1 green Saproling creature token. Any player may activate this ability.

card.name: Seal of Strength
card.property: Sacrifice Seal of Strength: Target creature gets +3/+3 until end of turn.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "I am the feeder, the morsel that revives the starving." —Seal inscription

card.name: Skyshroud Behemoth
card.property: Fading 2 (This creature enters the battlefield with two fade counters on it. At the beginning of your upkeep, remove a fade counter from it. If you can't, sacrifice it.) Skyshroud Behemoth enters the battlefield tapped.

card.name: Skyshroud Claim
card.property: Search your library for up to two Forest cards, put them onto the battlefield, then shuffle your library.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: The forest's constant struggle is to keep the spreading flowstone at bay.

card.name: Skyshroud Cutter
card.property: If you control a Forest, rather than pay this spell's mana cost, you may have each other player gain 5 life.

card.name: Skyshroud Poacher
card.property: {3}, {T}: Search your library for an Elf permanent card and put it onto the battlefield. Then shuffle your library.

card.name: Skyshroud Ridgeback
card.property: Fading 2 (This creature enters the battlefield with two fade counters on it. At the beginning of your upkeep, remove a fade counter from it. If you can't, sacrifice it.)

card.name: Skyshroud Sentinel
card.property: When Skyshroud Sentinel enters the battlefield, you may search your library for up to three cards named Skyshroud Sentinel, reveal them, and put them into your hand. If you do, shuffle your library.

card.name: Stampede Driver
card.property: {1} {G}, {T}, Discard a card: Creatures you control get +1/+1 and gain trample until end of turn.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "The thunder of hooves is music to my ears."

card.name: Treetop Bracers
card.property: Enchant creature (Target a creature as you cast this. This card enters the battlefield attached to that creature.) Enchanted creature gets +1/+1 and can't be blocked except by creatures with flying.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Gravity is truly what you make of it.

card.name: Wild Mammoth
card.property: At the beginning of your upkeep, if a player controls more creatures than each other player, the player who controls the most creatures gains control of Wild Mammoth.

card.name: Woodripper
card.property: Fading 3 (This creature enters the battlefield with three fade counters on it. At the beginning of your upkeep, remove a fade counter from it. If you can't, sacrifice it.) {1}, Remove a fade counter from Woodripper: Destroy target artifact.

card.name: Belbe's Armor
card.property: {X}, {T}: Target creature gets -X/+X until end of turn.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: It protects her from the ravages of Phyrexia and the savages of Rath.

card.name: Belbe's Portal
card.property: As Belbe's Portal enters the battlefield, choose a creature type. {3}, {T}: You may put a creature card of the chosen type from your hand onto the battlefield.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: The fight will continue on a new battlefield.

card.name: Complex Automaton
card.property: At the beginning of your upkeep, if you control seven or more permanents, return Complex Automaton to its owner's hand.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "This wasteful design cannot possibly be Phyrexian." —Belbe

card.name: Eye of Yawgmoth
card.property: {3}, {T}, Sacrifice a creature: Reveal a number of cards from the top of your library equal to the sacrificed creature's power. Put one into your hand and exile the rest.

card.name: Flint Golem
card.property: Whenever Flint Golem becomes blocked, defending player puts the top three cards of their library into their graveyard.

card.name: Flowstone Armor
card.property: You may choose not to untap Flowstone Armor during your untap step. {3}, {T}: Target creature gets +1/-1 for as long as Flowstone Armor remains tapped.

card.name: Flowstone Thopter
card.property: {1}: Flowstone Thopter gets +1/-1 and gains flying until end of turn.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Airborne flowstone isn't less dangerous, only less common.

card.name: Kill Switch
card.property: {2}, {T}: Tap all other artifacts. They don't untap during their controllers' untap steps for as long as Kill Switch remains tapped.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Success is largely a matter of knowing which lever to pull.

card.name: Parallax Inhibitor
card.property: {1}, {T}, Sacrifice Parallax Inhibitor: Put a fade counter on each permanent with fading you control.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "The best I can offer is a temporary reprieve." —Belbe

card.name: Predator, Flagship
card.property: {2}: Target creature gains flying until end of turn. {5}, {T}: Destroy target creature with flying.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "The scourge of Skyshroud is airborne once more." —Oracle en-Vec

card.name: Rackling
card.property: At the beginning of each opponent's upkeep, Rackling deals X damage to that player, where X is 3 minus the number of cards in their hand.

card.name: Rejuvenation Chamber
card.property: Fading 2 (This artifact enters the battlefield with two fade counters on it. At the beginning of your upkeep, remove a fade counter from it. If you can't, sacrifice it.) {T}: You gain 2 life.

card.name: Rusting Golem
card.property: Fading 5 (This creature enters the battlefield with five fade counters on it. At the beginning of your upkeep, remove a fade counter from it. If you can't, sacrifice it.) Rusting Golem's power and toughness are each equal to the number of fade counters on it.

card.name: Tangle Wire
card.property: Fading 4 (This artifact enters the battlefield with four fade counters on it. At the beginning of your upkeep, remove a fade counter from it. If you can't, sacrifice it.) At the beginning of each player's upkeep, that player taps an untapped artifact, creature, or land they control for each fade counter on Tangle Wire.

card.name: Viseling
card.property: At the beginning of each opponent's upkeep, Viseling deals X damage to that player, where X is the number of cards in their hand minus 4.

card.name: Kor Haven
card.property: {T}: Add {C}. {1}{W}, {T}: Prevent all combat damage that would be dealt by target attacking creature this turn.

card.name: Rath's Edge
card.property: {T}: Add {C}. {4}, {T}, Sacrifice a land: Rath's Edge deals 1 damage to any target.

card.name: Terrain Generator
card.property: {T}: Add {C}. {2}, {T}: You may put a basic land card from your hand onto the battlefield tapped.
